data.lyric:
[ti:Repeat After Me (Interlude) (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Repeat After Me(Interlude) (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:17.49]Lyrics by：Kevin Parker/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:34.98]Composed by：Kevin Parker/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:52.48]You don't love him you don't love him
[00:57.39]You don't love him if you're thinking of me
[01:02.57]You don't love him you're just f**king
[01:07.56]You're just f**king it means nothing to me
[01:12.55]You don't love him you don't love him
[01:17.51]You don't love him if you're thinking of me
[01:22.68]You don't love him you're just f**king
[01:27.77]You're just f**king it means nothing to me yeah
[01:33.42]It's been too long you changed up over time
[01:38.65]Why you why you gonna even try to hide
[01:43.70]It's natural to find someone to treat you right
[01:47.76]But it ain't right if you f**k him out of spite
[01:53.71]You don't have to cry girl let me wipe your eyes
[01:58.11]Your eyes your eyes your eyes
[02:03.88]I promise you will always be mine
[02:08.50]Oh-oh just repeat after me
[02:13.33]You don't love him you don't love him
[02:18.50]You don't love him if you're thinking of me
[02:22.22]It's all right
[02:23.50]You don't love him you're just f**king
[02:28.34]You're just f**king you're thinking of me
[02:33.45]You don't love him you don't love him
[02:38.49]You don't love him if you're thinking of me
[02:43.55]You don't love him you're just f**king
[02:48.33]You're just f**king it means nothing to me
data.trans:
[ti:Repeat After Me (Interlude) (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:17.49]//
[00:34.98]//
[00:52.48]你不爱他 你不爱他
[00:57.39]如果你想着我 你就算不上爱他
[01:02.57]你不爱他 你只是无可救药
[01:07.56]你只是无可救药 对我来说没关系
[01:12.55]你不爱他 你不爱他
[01:17.51]如果你想着我 你就算不上爱他
[01:22.68]你不爱他 你只是无可救药
[01:27.77]你只是无可救药 对我来说没关系
[01:33.42]很久了 随着时间流逝你变了样子
[01:38.65]你为什么要躲起来
[01:43.70]找一个对你好的人这无可厚非
[01:47.76]但如果你为了泄愤而和他鬼混 那就过分了
[01:53.71]你不必哭泣 女孩 让我擦干你的眼泪
[01:58.11]你的眼泪 你的眼泪 你的眼泪
[02:03.88]我保证你永远属于我
[02:08.50]跟我说
[02:13.33]你不爱他 你不爱他
[02:18.50]如果你想着我 你就算不上爱他
[02:22.22]这很好
[02:23.50]你不爱他 你只是无可救药
[02:28.34]你无可救药 你在想着我
[02:33.45]你不爱他 你不爱他
[02:38.49]如果你想着我 你就算不上爱他
[02:43.55]你不爱他 你只是无可救药
[02:48.33]你只是无可救药 对我来说没关系
